name: AmpCore
summary: Akamai Adaptive Media Player is a media player for iOS and tvOS.
description: Akamai Adaptive Media Player is a media player for iOS and tvOS. Akamai AMP can manage different plugins like Chromecast Playback, Akamai Media Analytics, Playback Statistics, Octoshape, ComScore, and VR.
